items.title: about the app
items.description:
Bumble is a free dating app helping singles find fun, meaningful, and kind connections. It’s the dating app where kindness is sexy, and women come first—always.


Bumble is a free dating app dedicated to helping singles find fun, meaningful, and kind connections. It’s the dating app where kindness is sexy, and where women come first, always. We champion respect and equality, and we don't just welcome, but we celebrate every orientation. So whether you're straight, gay, lesbian, trans, here to find love, here to find fun, here to find friends, or simply dating for the plot–creating new connections has never been easier.


Our community is filled with millions of people across the globe who are ready to chat and meet new people, build genuine and meaningful connections, and maybe find that artsy, museum-loving, Scorpio they've been looking for.


DATE, MEET NEW FRIENDS, AND NETWORK

Our matchmaking technology is constantly evolving to create a fun, kind, and most importantly safe experience for you across all of our apps, including:


Bumble Date: Where women make the first move. Women always come first on Bumble, we've rewritten the dating rules so that everyone can form meaningful relationships safely and respectfully.


Bumble For Friends: Life is better with friends. Whether you're new to a city or hoping to expand your circle, Bumble For Friends is an easy way to make new friends.


Bumble Bizz: Yep, you read that correctly. We have Bumble Bizz, too. Use Bumble Bizz to network, find mentors, and create new exciting career opportunities.


WOMEN COME FIRST, ALWAYS

We believe a better world for women means a better world for everyone. So, for the most part, women get to make the first move around here. In heterosexual matches, the woman has 24 hours to make the first move and the man has 24 hours to respond. In same-sex matches, either person has 24 hours to make the first move, while the other individual has 24 hours to respond. So, don't let them be the one that got away. Send that message ASAP.


DON'T JUST TAKE OUR WORD FOR IT

“Bumble exists to empower women...” (Fast Company)

“Bumble is just an app: but it’s changing the discussion.” (Wired)

“Bumble offers an alternative that prioritises meaningful connections, with women calling the shots:” (UK Sunday Times)

“Bumble rejects hate speech to make users feel safe on its dating app” (Texas Standard)

“What makes Bumble different from other dating apps...is its focus on giving women all the power. ” (Business Insider)


---


Like the best things in life, Bumble is free to download and use. But we do also offer optional subscription packages (Bumble Premium and Bumble Boost) and single or multiple-use paid services for which no subscription is required (including Spotlights and SuperSwipes).


We offer weekly, monthly, 3 month, and 6 month subscriptions with varying discounts. The prices may vary per country and are subject to change without notice. Prices are clearly displayed in the app.


* Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

* Your subscription will automatically renew itself, unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

* Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period.

* You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings in the iTunes Store.

* If offered, if you choose to use our free trial, any unused portion of the free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription to that publication, where applicable

* If you don’t choose to purchase Bumble Boost or Bumble Premium, you can simply continue using and enjoying Bumble for free.

items.title: about the app
items.description: Import your Goodreads data: We will import all of your currently-reading, read, to-read, and did-not-finish shelves. Weâve got machine learning-powered suggestions for great reading buddies.Reading Challenges: Want to read one book from every country in the world? Then, when searching for your next read, all of this information is at your disposal.Features:â¢ Import your Goodreads accountâ¢ Reading charts and graphsâ¢ Buddy readsâ¢ Readalongsâ¢ Personalized machine learning recommendationsâ¢ Follow your friends to see what they're readingâ¢ Annual reading, page, and listening goalsâ¢ Search/browse books by mood, pace, and moreâ¢ Custom tagsâ¢ Lists to share with your friends or the publicâ¢ Create your own reading challenge or join in with othersâ¢ Dark Modeâ¢ Barcode Scannerâ¢ Giveawaysâ¢ Browse similar booksâ¢ Find similar usersâ¢ Half and quarter star ratingsâ¢ Built-in DNF (Did Not Finish) functionality (including tracking pages read)â¢ Progress updates with built-in reading journalâ¢ Author-approved and user-submitted content warningsWant to support an independent, Goodreads alternative? Consider upgrading to Plus!â¢ Keep the platform ad-free: You'll help The StoryGraph stay independent!â¢ Custom Charts: Create your own pie and bar charts, customise the colors and labels, and populate them using custom tags or custom book length ranges.â¢ Extra Stats Filters: Filter down your stats to a custom time period, or view stats for your fiction or nonfiction reads, your custom tags, any particular mood or genre, and more. You can also see your average rating across different book types and formats.â¢ Compare Stats: Compare any two stats segments of your StoryGraph library, whether that's a particular year against a custom time period, your To-Read Pile against your owned books, or a combination of several other options.â¢ Exclusive Charts: When comparing your reading across two different years, see exclusive year-on-year charts on the number of books read and their genres.â¢ Shape the roadmap: You get to vote and comment on upcoming features as well as submit official requests for new onesâ¢ Priority Support: Your support tickets and requests for book information updates will be handled firstPrivacy Policy: https://app.thestorygraph.com/privacyTerms of Service:https://app.thestorygraph.com/terms-of-service

items.title: about the app
items.description:
Individual care schedule and reminders for your plants, recommendations, step by step guides, identification, light meter and more. Keep your plants alive with Planta!


**Editor’s Choice 2024 & App of the Day 2024**


Join 7 million users and 32 million plants!


You’re only one tap away from your personal jungle - Take a photo of your plant and Planta takes care of the rest!


- Smart Care Reminders: Powered by Planta’s algorithms!

Not sure when it’s time to water your plants? Planta knows! Just add them to the app and get notified when it’s time to water, fertilize, mist, repot, and clean (yes, it’s a thing)!


- Plant identification: Take a photo of your plant and find out everything you need!

If you aren’t sure what plant you have, just take a picture of it and Planta will instantly let you know. With Planta’s plant scanner you can scan all your houseplants to get the right ID and care plan for your plant.


- Dr. Planta: Cure sick plants with Dr. Planta!

Plants not feeling well? Yellow leaves, brown spots, mysterious bugs, weak growth? Dr. Planta can help you figure out what’s wrong. Get the right diagnosis and set up a treatment plan to cure your plant.


- Light meter: Find a plant that suits every corner of your home!

Some plants prefer shade and some love the sun. Get to know which plants are suitable for your home based on the different light conditions of your rooms.


- Community: Engage in the plant community!

Engage in discussions with fellow plant enthusiasts, share plant care experiences, seek advice, and celebrate successes with a supportive community of green thumbs!


- More from Planta:

Step by step guides!

Plant recommendations suited to your environment and skills!

Plant Journal for keeping track of your plant’s growth!

Discover new plants!

Specific info about all your plants at your fingertips!

Share your account and plant care tasks with family and caretakers!

items.title: about the app
items.description: For anyone fighting against the rise of misinformation, sensationalism, and biased news, the Ground News Mac app will help you easily compare how a story is being covered by thousands of sources from across the political spectrum and from around the world.If you are like the many people who feel overwhelmed and under-informed as they piece together patchwork information from social media and conflicting news sources, Ground News will empower you with an array of visualization and comparison tools that makes it simple to analyze, understand, and draw your own conclusions about a developing news story. Unlike traditional news aggregators, which utilize crowd-sourcing and algorithms that reward clickbait and reinforce pre-existing bias, Ground News helps users understand the news objectively based on media bias, geographic location, and time.Ground News is the worldâs first news comparison platform that will help voters make better-informed decisions, drawing from more than 40,000 news sources worldwide and featuring an average of 30,000 news stories per day.Also, included in the Mac app is our new Safari extension. Try out Ground News Bias Checker for Safari. Whenever you read a news article, our browser extension will show you who else is covering the same news story and compare how other sources from all across the political spectrum are reporting on it.About Ground News subscriptions purchased within the Ground News app:â¢ Subscription renews annually, and you'll be able to manage this subscription in your App Store account under the 'Ground News' subscriptionâ¢ Payment will be charged to your App Store Account on confirmation of purchaseâ¢ Your membership subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current periodâ¢ Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current periodâ¢ Membership subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after purchase See full terms and conditions here: https://ground.news/terms-and-conditions

items.title: about the app
items.description:
ONE VIDEO IS WORTH A THOUSAND TEXTS
Communicate face-to-face in a private, ad-free space with no interruptions or intrusions. This award-winning video chat app isn’t social media. There are no “likes” or comparisons, and there are no tricks to keep you on the app for longer than you wish.

SIMPLE, CONVENIENT, ANYTIME CONNECTION
Send a video. Get one back. Talk one-on-one or in groups. Continue the conversation on your own schedule.

YOU DON’T HAVE TO COMPROMISE ON TRUST
Our purpose? To help people feel close. To fulfill it, Marco Polo does things differently.

We monetize responsibly. The Marco Polo Plus subscription plan allows us to make money in a way that’s true to our purpose – no ads, no selling your data – while maintaining a free service for the majority of our community.

We hold ourselves accountable. Earning your trust is vital to our team, from the technology we create to the business decisions we make.

We measure our impact. Does our product deliver on our promise and our purpose? Does it make people happier? Research indicates yes, and we commit to conducting this research regularly to ensure we stay on track.

CHOOSE THE VERSION THAT FITS YOUR LIFE
Marco Polo is FREE, with:
Unlimited chats and groups
Emoji reactions and fun special effects
Sharecast, our newest feature. Send one video to everyone in your circle, and only you see reactions and replies. It’s the convenience of groups with no cross-conversations.

Marco Polo Plus offers premium features including:
1.5-3x speed control
Background listening
Custom and animated emojis
6 Plus Passes so you can share 2 months free with friends and family

PLUS SUBSCRIPTION PRICING PLANS

Annual: $5/month billed annually at $59.99

Marco Polo Plus Family
Save with up to six memberships with one plan. Plus Family is not limited to members within one household.

items.title: about the app
items.description: CHANI is your personalized guide through lifeâs ups and downs. The app was designed to make astrology accessible and useful. Our mission is to help people live their lifeâs purpose, and we believe that when you know your birth chart â aka your lifeâs blueprint â youâre better equipped to unlock your lifeâs potential and your personal power.WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING:âThis app is my safe space.ââThis app is like a chat with my best friendâThis app is honestly life changing. Never have I understood myself moreâ.âthe best way to start every dailyââI always laugh. I am often deeply moved. And always leave with more tools and compassion in my pocket to move through my day and the world.âOur app is FREE to download. ALL users have access to the following FREE FEATURES AND CONTENT:- DAILY HOROSCOPES: Daily horoscopes to know how the astrology of the day will impact you.- MOON PHASES: Daily updates on the Moonâs phase and sign, and guidance on how to create Moon magic.- THE WEEK AHEAD: A weekly podcast that gives you a rundown of the astrology of the week and tips on how to work with it.- THE CURRENT SKY: A snapshot of what sign each planet is currently in, along with dates and information on when each planet stations retrograde.- ASTRO WEATHER: An astrological forecast of how the next 7 days will look on a collective level- BIRTH CHART: An overview of where each planet is positioned in your birth chart, and a summary of each planetâs role.We also offer PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTIONS that unlock all app content. This includes the following PREMIUM FEATURES:- BIRTH CHART READINGS & DESCRIPTIONS: Detailed insights into your unique birth chart. This feature unlocks every planet in your chart and the significant relationships they have with one another.- WEEKLY MAGIC & MANIFESTATION: Weekly readings, rituals, and audio offerings to help you get the most out of the week and its astrology. This also includes a personalized podcast for your rising sign, guided meditations and affirmations, journal prompts, and altar suggestions. With this content, youâll get all of the tools you need to work with major astrological moments like New Moons, Full Moons, retrogrades, eclipses, and more.- DAILY FEATURED MEDITATION: A guided meditation for each day to help you make the most of the dayâs astrological energy.- TRANSITS: A daily, hyper-personalized look at how the planets in the sky are interacting with your unique birth chart. These transits are time-sensitive and build upon your horoscopes by giving you precise insight into when and how certain planets will impact you.- YOUR YEAR AHEAD: A personalized astro-reading for the year that tells you what to expect each month, what the main themes of the year are, and how to work with the astrology via rituals, journal prompts, alar suggestions, and guided meditations.- A LIBRARY OF AFFIRMATIONS AND GUIDED MEDITATIONS: A library of audio meditations and affirmations to support you through all of your moods and needs.Who we are: CHANI is a queer, feminist-led team on a mission to support everyone in living their purpose. 5% of all our companyâs revenue is disbursed directly to queer, trans, Black, Indigenous, POC, and/or disabled survivors of gender-based violence by freefrom.org. We believe in promoting economic justice from the inside out and that good business prioritizes personal well-being. items.title: about the app
items.description:
Whether you’re building, remodeling or decorating, Houzz has you covered.

Get the Best Design Ideas for Your Home

The Houzz app topped The New York Times list of “best apps for home improvement.” The Washington Post called Houzz the “single best source" for finding inspiration. CNN named it the “Wikipedia of interior and exterior design.”

Find something fun to hit up by date, time and location. Buy tix and keep ‘em handy on your mobile device to make check-in nice and easy. Ready to explore?

With the Eventbrite app you can:

• Find what’s new and hot nearby at a wide variety of venues
• Stay in the know on what’s going on today, this week, this weekend, whenever
• Get personalized event recos for whatever you’re into
• Share events with your crew and vice versa
• Add upcoming events to your calendar
• Buy tickets and check out easily on your mobile phone
• Store your credit or debit cards for fast, secure checkout
• View event details so you can get there on time and own it
• Check-in with the app, ditch old school paper tix

What does Eventbrite do?

There’s an amazing, fun, interesting world of events going on anywhere at anytime, we help you discover the best.

You can find things to do based on what you’re into, where you want to go or when you want to go out.

We’ll also personalize recommendations based on where you’ve been and what you like.

Let’s get out there and explore.

This app is also available in German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, and Swedish.

INFORMATION SHARING: When purchasing tickets or registering for an event, we provide the information entered to the event organizer so they can manage the event.

items.title: about the app
items.description: AI Search, Community ChatsWelcome to Diem! Weâre building your new front door to the internet.Diem is a search-engine-meets-social-network designed first for girls, women, and LGBTQIA+ folks. You can search the internet with Diem AI and find answers to anything life throws at you. âHow do I get over a friend breakup? Whatâs the best way to negotiate salary? My boyfriend follows models on Instagramâis that a red flag?â Diem is here to help.Our platform is also full of novel, collective knowledge from people all over the world. You can socialize your search to start conversations, discover a network of communities, connect over shared experiences and browse trending topics.Joining Diem means showing up with no judgment and immersing yourself in the candid, funny, authentic, important, supportive, outrageous, honest, and wholesome questions of other Diemers, which span everything from birth control to friendship, sexuality to pop culture, parenting to relationships, money to reproductive health, career to books, and so much more. Diem feels more like searching for answers in the girlsâ bathroom than spiraling alone on the internet.Hereâs what you can find in the app today:Diem AI-powered searchAsk Diem AI, our AI-powered search tool, your questions! Our search engine is designed to be less bias than other models. You can think of Diem AI as your most knowledgeable Virgo âbig sisterâ who lives in your back pocket. Diem AI draws from across the internet and the collective wisdom of Diemers to generate you a speedy answer. When you ask Diem AI youâll receive a short summary answer, community sources (previous, related conversations in Diem), community spaces, web pages, Reddit threads and TikTok videos. You can dive in to these search results OR you can post your search to the community feed to get real-time feedback from people whoâve been there.Diem AI LensesYou can now ask questions of leading experts and your fave creators in Diem. Ask their Lens anything and your search result will feature their opinions & content from across the internet.Discover thousands of authentic conversationsFrom awkward sex questions to wholesome big sisterly advice or navigating lifeâs highs and lows, Diem is full of the collective knowledge of girls, women, and LGBTQIA+ folks in over 100 countries.Thereâs no judgment here and youâll feel that very quickly.Post anonymously or under a pseudonymWe think of the anonymous feature as a confidence booster. Sometimes posting âtabooâ questions or personal stories publicly can be nerve-wracking, so this feature is designed to make you feel more comfortable while getting the advice you need.Community SpacesCommunity Spaces are micro communities that are also discoverable when related questions are searched via Diem AI. A few currently live: Am I wrong?, Big Sis Advice (BSA) and Is this Normalâ¦? (ITN) Weâre still early in building out Spaces and you can request additional Spaces or host your own.Creating PostsIf you have a longer story, recommendation or advice to offer you can click the + button on your Discover feed and type out all your stories or wisdom. These posts will be discovered via the search engine and in Diemerâs discovery feeds.Upvoting & BookmarkingSee a post or response you want to save for later or give some love to, click to bookmark, âheartâ or upvote it!Safety & Privacy FirstSafety & moderation are our top priority at Diem. See something, say something! We have distributed moderationâif you report something, we review it, ensuring thereâs no violation of the community culture. We also take your privacy very seriouslyâwhatever you search is your business.Weâre still early in our journey to build Diem into your new âfront doorâ to the internet, if you have any problems or ideas for the app, get support at

items.title: about the app
items.description:
#1 SKINCARE APP IN THE WORLD

At Skin Bliss, we recognize that everyone’s skin is unique. We have empowered millions of people to discover their unique skin profiles and find the right skincare product matches to achieve optimal skin health. Gain personalized insights into your skin's changes and receive guidance and accountability along the way.

SCIENCE-FIRST APPROACH

Rooted in AI, scientific research and supported by world-class skincare experts, researchers, and scientists, the Skin Bliss app is the most extensive skincare intelligence app ever created. Whether you have acne, dryness, wrinkles, oily skin, eczema, or any other skin concerns, it identifies the best ingredients and matches you with a product formulation that’s safe and effective for your skin profile.

KEY FEATURES

- FACE SCANNER—YOUR SKIN ANALYZED—Discover your unique skin profile and receive real-time analysis and personalized "Skinsights" with just a snap of your face.
- PRODUCT COMPATIBILITY - Unsure if your skincare products work well together? Eliminate the guesswork, analyze potential conflicts, and ensure that all your products complement each other and your skin perfectly.
- LIST EVALUATION - Create and evaluate any product list as a complete skincare routine. Assess the overall match and coverage of skincare needs and identify any gaps to ensure optimal skincare outcomes.
- PRODUCT MATCHER: Find out which of your favorite cosmetics from Sephora, Ulta, Lookfantastic, and other shops are best for you.
- PRODUCT REPORT: Get unlimited in-depth reports for any cosmetic in the world and find out if the brands you like are cruelty-free, vegan, or halal.
- PRODUCT ANALYZER: Scan the barcode, take a picture of the ingredients list, or copy-paste the ingredients to find out if the product is suitable for your unique skin profile.
- PRODUCT ORGANIZER: Create lists to organize your daily skincare routine, keep track of your wishlist products, and remember the expiry date of your products.
- PRODUCT FILTER & FINDER: Filter the best products for your skin by active ingredients, country, store, price, and compare multiple products side-by-side to make the smartest purchase to save yourself time and money on trial-and-errors.
- PRODUCT REVIEWS: Find reviews that matter for your skin type and contribute to the Skin Bliss community by reviewing your own products.

THE CLEAR YOUR ACNE PROGRAM

The world’s first-of-its-kind program teaches you how to achieve acne-free skin, become your own skincare expert, and make smarter choices about your routine.

End your fight with acne in 10 weeks through:

- EXPERT GUIDANCE: video lessons, tutorials, and quizzes designed by dermatologists, scientists, and pharmacists.
- TARGETED SOLUTIONS: Follow a daily program that tackles your skin concerns with the right products as you build the best routine for your skin.
- ACTIONABLE INSIGHTS: Track your day-and-night skincare routines and progress with weekly photos.

Download the Skin Bliss app to take control of your skincare journey, and watch the first lesson of the program for FREE.

Enjoy the app in six languages: English, Spanish, German, Italian, French or Portuguese.

SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION

Download the Skin Bliss app now and receive a SPECIAL PROMOTION in the first few hours! Enjoy a FREE TRIAL of the Skin Bliss Premium Experience.

Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions on your ‘Account Settings’.

PURE uses auto-renewing subscriptions â you have to subscribe to get inside.Hereâs what you should know about PURE subscriptions:- If you choose to purchase a weekly, monthly or annual subscription you will be able to go online and interact via chats with other users during the chosen subscription period. items.title: about the app
items.description: Wanna be more mindful of your shopping habits? Buy less with bless, find joy and purpose in every purchase, and turn shopping into a fulfilling experience.Introducing bless, the perfect shopping companion that helps you adopt a mindful approach to shopping. Whether you want to keep track of your spending, declutter your living space, adopt a minimalist lifestyle, or make purchases that reflect your values, bless has got you covered. The whimsical raccoon guide will assist you in making thoughtful purchase decisions and developing a healthier relationship with material possessions.Bless is more than just an app - it's a partner on your journey towards mindful consumption, offering insightful features and supportive guidance to make every purchase meaningful.Mindful Wishlist:Add the things you wish to buy and revisit them after a set period. This feature promotes thoughtful purchases, reduces impulsive buying, and encourages reflection on spending habits.Expense Tracker:Track your expenses, understand your spending habits, and align purchases with your values using an intuitive interface that simplifies the process.Don't Want Anymore List:Catalog items you decided not to purchase, keep track of your savings and reflect on your consumption choices. Most importantly, be proud of your mindful decisions.Got Rid Of List:Log your progress in decluttering your living space. Select how you've parted ways with your non-essential possessions, whether you sold them or gave them away. Revisit the list and experience the satisfaction of seeing how far you've come.âShould I?â Test:A feature that encourages thoughtful spending through reflective questioning before making a purchase. You'll learn to make informed decisions and adopt a mindful approach to consumption.Educational Content:Discover a collection of resources on mindful shopping, minimalism, and conscious consumerism. Our raccoon companion provides daily tips to help make mindful consumption effortless.Shopping Shield:Your online shopping experience just got much more mindful. If you feel that browsing shopping apps and websites risks your budget and distracts you from more important things in your life, install Bless Shield. Now, you can block certain apps and websites and even pick entire categories, like social media, to help you stay focused and mindful of your spending.Challenges:Who doesn't love a good challenge? Try out a week or a month of decluttering (get rid of one thing a day), mindful shopping (log every purchase to the app), or digital detox (no online shopping). The longer you keep it up, the easier it gets. Even if you don't complete the whole thing, don't lose your motivation; you can always start again!Premium features:Subscribing to the bless premium plan gives you access to a variety of handy features. You can easily set up and change currencies, track your shopping tendencies via colorful charts, and select your preferred raccoon icon. We appreciate your support and plan for many future updates!Term of Use: https://www.getbless.app/privacy-terms
